name: Santorini
description: Famous for its white-washed buildings and stunning sunsets over the caldera.

name: Kyoto
description: Traditional temples and serene bamboo forests during cherry blossom season.

name: Banff National Park
description: Turquoise lakes and rugged mountain peaks in the Canadian Rockies.

name: Patagonia
description: Dramatic glaciers and hiking trails at the end of the world.

name: Serengeti National Park
description: Witness the Great Migration of wildebeest and zebras.

name: Dubrovnik
description: Medieval walled city on the Adriatic coast, a Game of Thrones filming location.

name: Queenstown
description: Adventure capital with bungee jumping and stunning fjords.

name: Petra
description: Ancient Nabatean city carved into rose-red sandstone cliffs.

name: Reykjavik
bestSeason: June - August / Northern Lights in Winter
description: Gateway to geothermal spas, volcanoes, and the Northern Lights.

name: Bora Bora
description: Overwater bungalows and crystal-clear lagoons with coral reefs.

name: Marrakech
description: Vibrant souks, palaces, and gardens in this historic imperial city.

description: Unique wildlife including giant tortoises and marine iguanas.

name: Venice
description: Canals, gondolas, and Renaissance architecture on 118 islands.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: Geysers, hot springs, and North America's largest supervolcano.

name: Cape Town
description: Table Mountain, penguin beaches, and the Cape of Good Hope.
